page.title: 16WELFARE, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Community Work. During the past year a community programme has been introduced to the people of the village.This is held in the Methodist Chapel which has been specially redesigned to house the variety of activities which are now being provided. {Senior Citizens. A Day-Centre operates which acts as a social meeting place for the many older people who feel lonely, or who like to meet with others outside their own homes.Various speakers are invited to talk with the members to help give them interests and also topics of conversation afterwards. Meals are provided on certain days for those who enjoy eating-out with other people. Day outings are frequently arranged and are proving to be very popular.
